name: A Bike Race Squad - City Run Multiplayer Racing Free Edition
name_original: A Bike Race Squad - City Run Multiplayer Racing Free Edition
description:
RRRRRev up that engine and get ready to join the Race with your ultimate Super Bike through the City Streets of Downtown.

Experience REAL TIME MULTIPLAYER RACING Action – Challenge your Facebook Friends to become part of your Bike Squad and race each other like crazy through 5 unique districts and power through 25 super awesome City stages. Whether you Choose Dangerous Dave on his Super Bike or just rip roar your way through the streets with The Mod father on his pimped up Scooter, The Race is most definitely on… Ready?

Featuring:

- Real Time Multiplayer Racing
- 25 Unique City Levels Spanning 5 Districts
- Create Your own Battles with Facebook friends
- 5 Custom Bikes including Super Bike, Scooter, Quad Bike, Trial Bike and Harley Roadster

Find Us Online;

Twitter: @RisingHighApps
Web: www.RisingHigh.net
